text_preview:
Major extra and intracellular electrolytes
Definition – Electrolytes are ions (charged atoms or molecules) that dissociate in water
and conduct electricity. “Major” physiological ions are those present in millimolar
quantities in body fluids and essential for life. They are grouped by their chief lo...
